title: Total Coal Production for United States
notes:
Data Equal To The Sum Of Series (Anthracite Coal Shipments) And Series (Bituminous Coal Production). Source: U.S. Bureau Of Mines, Mineral Resources, 1924, Pp. 588-589.

This NBER data series a01210 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.

NBER Indicator: a01210
